name: Game & Watch Gallery 3 (itch)
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.0 (beta) Details Title Game & Watch Gallery 3 Model No. DMG-AGQE Series Game Boy Color Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date December 6, 1999 Chipset Sharp LR35902 ( 4.2 MHz ) Description

Game & Watch Gallery 3 is a collection of five classic Game & Watch titles from Nintendo remade for the Game Boy Color handheld console.

Gameplay

You can play each of the five Game & Watch titles included in this collection based on the gameplay of the original LCD handhelds (Classic mode) or in an updated version (Modern mode) with new graphics, colors, sound effects and all your favorite Nintendo characters.

  • Egg
    Catch your eggs before they hatch!
     
  • Greenhouse
    Protect your plants from pesky pests.
     
  • Turtle Bridge
    Carry packages across the turtles backs!
     
  • Mario Bros.
    Help Mario & Luigi keep the factory flowing.
     
  • Donkey Kong Jr.
    Grab the key and free Donkey Kong.
     
Controls Keyboard Start Enter Select Space Button A X or CTRL Button B Z or SHIFT Up W or Up Arrow Down S or Down Arrow Left A or Left Arrow Right D or Right Arrow Mouse Rotate Drag Press Left-click Zoom Mousewheel
